ago LONDON( AFP)- British Tony Blair David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government. Mike Davis, senior analyst at Ovum, said the company was awarding Eric Schmidt the payout for taking Google from a garage start-up into a multi-billion profit company during his ten-year tenure. The share cash-in could be due to Eric Schmidt knowing something we don't, but he is probably just looking for a really good retirement, added Mike Davis. Under the leadership of Eric Schmidt , Google has branched into several new markets such as mobile devices with its Android operating system and the enterprise market with Google Apps.
